name: Margaret_Honeycutt
text:
Margaret Honeycutt
Margaret Honeycutt was a teacher at Twin Peaks High School.
Biography
On February 23, 1989, she was teaching to Laura's classroom.
The following morning, she was interrupted while taking roll by a state trooper who asked if Bobby Briggs was in her class. He then pulled her aside, telling her that her absent student, Laura Palmer, was found dead. Shocked, she told her class that there would be an announcement.
